pdf-upload.upload-area-text: In this area you can upload PDF files via Drag & Drop or by selecting them directly

welcome.headline: Welcome to the official signature service of the TU Graz
welcome.description: With this application you can, provided you are authorized to do so, sign PDF files in the name of the TU Graz

error-permission-message: You need have permissions to use the official signature to use this function!
error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
page-updated-needs-reload: The application has been updated. Please reload the page.
